item.title: About
item.description: Hey, My name is Jobin Jose. I am currently working as a Devops engineer based out of Oslo, Norway; particularly focused on areas around Azure, Devops, IaC, Automation and Security. The statements I have posted on this site are mine alone and do not necessarily reflect the views of any organization. Should there be questions or concerns about the contents, feel free to reachout ðŸ“§ jobinjosem@hotmail.com
